intro: Bilolok means Kava in the local language of a small village on the east, south-east side of Malekula island in Vanuatu.

app.install_app_subtitle: Open Bilolok directly from your homescreen or desktop
app.install_app_body: It only takes a few seconds and makes it easier to return to Bilolok in the future since you can access Bilolok directly from your homescreen.
app.no_service_worker_body: Your browser does not support Service Workers so many features of this app will not work as intended and it will be slower. Please consider using a more modern web browser.

home.end_of_feed_extra: Browse our map and see what else is on Bilolok.

nakamal.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this kava bar?
nakamal.tab_timeline_be_first_to_checkin: No kat jek-in lo kava bar ia iet. Yu save mekem fes jek-in!
nakamal.tab_images_confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this image?
nakamal.chief_what_is_this: This is the user who has the most check-ins in the last 30 days.

user.remove_profile_image_confirm: Are you sure you want to remove your profile picture?
user.no_activity_private_body: Once you begin using the app you will see your history of activity here, including check-ins at kava bars, videos, images, etc.
user.no_activity_public_body: This user has no public activity to share.

auth.login_available: Do you already have an account on Bilolok?
auth.register_available: Have you not joined Bilolok already?
auth.email_not_verified_body: Your email account is not yet verified. You will not be able to perform some actions until you verify your email belongs to you.
auth.verify_email_body: Please click the following button to complete verification of your email address. Once complete, you will be able to upload images, check-in to kava bars and more.

alert.auth_required_subtitle: You must sign in to perform that action
alert.auth_required_body: We require users have an account with us to perform some actions.
alert.email_verification_required_subtitle: You must verify your email to perform that action
alert.email_verification_required_body: We require users verify their email they provided during sign up to help prevent abuse.
alert.email_verification_sent_body: An email was sent with instructions to reset your password.
alert.email_verification_missing_token_body: Missing email verification token in request.
alert.password_reset_success_body: You may now login with your new password.
alert.password_reset_fail_body: The password reset link is invalid or expired.
alert.password_reset_missing_token_body: You may not reset your password without a valid token.

checkin.title: Check-in
checkin.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this check-in?

image.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this image?

trip.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this trip?

video.not_supported: Sorry, your browser does not support embedded videos. Here is a link to the video instead.
video.processing: Your video is still processing and not ready for playing yet.
video.error: Video Error. Something went wrong and we will try to fix it. Otherwise we will delete this video in the coming days.
video.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this video?
